website_summaries.verdict: The dresser’s unique cubby bin is a welcome feature for harried parents.
pros: Solidly built, with deep drawers that are heavy enough to keep toddlers from opening them
Bottom storage bin is very handy
Looks like a much more expensive furniture piece
cons: Drawers can crack on assembly if power tools are used
Some parts of assembly are confusing and time consuming

customer_reviews.title: this was an excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, this was an excellent buy!!! Key quality features: -Metal drawer sliders!!!! -Press board pieces for the back, not that thin folded cardboard and nails crud. -Sturdy. It's all there and heavy. I'm probably going to have to buy my delivery guy a Christmas present for that. -Abundant space. Perfect for my 4 year old fashionista. Looks great. Assembled in about 2 hours myself. Took two tools.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessFalvo

customer_reviews.title: Great. Quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these drawers. Bought two for my daughter. Instructions were easy to read me and my eight year old put both together. Some parts you definitely can't do alone without clamps. The packages did come pretty beat up in the mail. One box had been partially torn open but thankfully the bag with all of the screws etc. didnt fall out. Very very heavy boxes. Recommend just cutting it open and carrying it inside in pieces or if you own a dolly use that. I kind of want two for myself, they are nice dressers. Note: There were no extra pieces or spare parts in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Carlile

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Sturdy, and Worth it for a kids room.
customer_reviews.text: Just like anyone else, I read reviews before buying any product. I took my chance with this and I'm very glad that I did. To start off, the dresser is heavy. I'd advise to have two people put together for a smoother assembly. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE YOU START. I cannot stress this enough. I am a mechanic whos life is tech manuals, and even I chose to overlook some details while looking at the photos, which resulted in rework. Luckily I was not alone putting this together. Ha. Overall, the dresser is sturdy. It does take some time to put together but once its finished, you will feel accomplished - trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Barajas

customer_reviews.title: I am sure the idea of the drawer is great..
customer_reviews.text: SERIOUSELY< SAUDER! To post off damaged (heavy) items to amazon customers?!? I am sure the idea of the drawer is great...but it arrived in a PREVIOUSLY destroyed smashed ripped corners and sides box...so it didn't happen during the transportation, because saucer just put plastic wrap all over it and some heavy corners, to try to keep it in shape during the trip..helped too little though, because the inside was scratched, broken and smashed. Great job..
customer_reviews.author: Marina Poplavskaya Guedouar

customer_reviews.title: Good product, supplier needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product: easy to put together, sturdy and great directions for those less "handy". I had a couple of parts missing from the original package, so I contacted Sauder for them. I was informed that I needed to pay shipping and handling on them , although I already paid S&H on the original order. Totally unacceptable that I should have to pay twice for parts that were not included originally.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hermens

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but still great!
customer_reviews.text: Im not very good at putting things together so I had a friend come and assemble this. He seemed to do it no problem. You’ll definitely need two sets of hands for a few steps. When we were almost done, the top drawer was not cut correctly and we couldn’t finish. I logged on to the manufacturer website and put in the information for the parts needed. It was very easy and I had the new parts in less than a week, no charge. The fact the it! was so easy to order the needed parts, free and fast, really made up for the fact that we couldn’t finish it the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: Great combo! Inspect after receiving.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dresser/toy box combo. I bought this for my 2 year old daughter and my husband was very impressed with the quality. The only issues/concerns we had were when we received it and all the pieces were very loose in the box and the box pretty much fell apart when we started to open it. We were preparing for a return but when we opened it we only found one small ding and it was on an internal piece and definitely not worth trying to return. Overall we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mkm7784

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful dresser for the price. Very heavy and not difficult to assemble (hubby & I assembled this in a little over an hour). It came with all the pieces and hardware clearly marked. It was packaged very well with heavy hardboard corner protectors to keep the laminate from chipping. Would’ve given this five stars; but I think the drawer bottoms should’ve been made from a little thicker material (not pressed cardboard). Other than this, we really love this piece of furniture. I think our granddaughters are gonna get many years of use out of this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Val Cresci

customer_reviews.title: Love the way this dresser looks
customer_reviews.text: My fiancè put this together by himself in less than an hour It looks so elegant and it is very sturdy and so cute. I think this will go perfect in any nursery room or kids room. I would probably even use one for myself. This dresser is very elegant for a reasonable price, very sturdy and easy to put together the instructions are very easy as well. The draws I will expect to be a little more spacious but it's for baby clothes so I assume they aren't suppose to be so deep.
customer_reviews.author: queen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dresser
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dresser. I wanted something that could hold my kids clothing but also somewhere to store their dress up clothes. This is perfect because they can easily get to their dress up clothes in the bottom without opening any drawers. The drawers themselves are very deep! I put it together by myself and it took me probably an hour and a half. Probably would have been easier/faster with two people but it wasn't complicated at all. It is very sturdy and durable. And very heavy. I suggest putting it together in the room that you're planning on using it in.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryll Lamorie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Solid cabinet. Looks very good. Very heavy!! It took about two hours to put it together. It is very well designed and the directions are very clear. All the parts are well labeled. The wall anchor is too fragile for a piece this tall and heavy, so I highly recommend buying one separately. The Hangman Anti-Tip Kit - 400 Pound Falling Furniture Prevention Device (TK-400) is perfect for this piece. The shipping box was so heavy that I opened it up on my porch and carried the pieces upstairs for assembly. I'm just over 6'1" and a big man, so most people will not be able to handle the box alone.
customer_reviews.author: Abc Xyz

customer_reviews.title: Love all of our Sauder products.
customer_reviews.text: I have Sauder products for both of my kids rooms, and will probably only buy Sauder products. The price is great, and the quality outshines the price by far. Super easy to install (although some pieces are a bit hard to line up, admittedly.) The price to quality is worth the installation, though. It'd say it's average installation frustration, though :P
customer_reviews.author: Ash MarksTM

customer_reviews.title: EASY to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dresser to fit into a pantry I’m making. VERY easy to assemble. I had to tweak it and assemble it in my closet, so for me it was a little different putting it together but it worked out perfectly! The drawers slide out easy. Unfortunately it did come with a chip on one end but I didn’t mind that because the chip wasn’t going to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: MrsPoulter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, large, functional...
customer_reviews.text: This is a large, sturdy, super functional dresser. I expected a child's size dresser, but was pleasantly surprised and a little envious of it. I especially love the open front storage area at the bottom. Its made in the USA, and shipped all the way to Alaska, no problem, so I wouldn't hesitate to buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Green

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of hours for me to put together. Overall it’s a good dresser. I like the bottom open storage. I use it to store my child’s toys. The only issue that have with this dresser is the top drawer rubs when I open it or close it. I’ve tried to fix it- but have had no luck. Other than that, the dresser is pretty sturdy and definitely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha ammerman

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart and could of hurt my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: This thing fell apart within a few months, the parts didn't fit when I put it together the sizing was wrong, pieces were larger then the drawers. I don't recommend this to anyone even though it has some good reviews. Garbage and don't waste your money I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Maryhelen Valdez

customer_reviews.title: I nice addition to a young teen's room
customer_reviews.text: I've assembled (too) many pieces of this kind of furniture, and this one is better than most. For example, the back is the same kind of heavy engineered wood as the rest of it--other furniture often has heavy paperboard backs. The storage bin at the bottom is clever in that it makes the base bigger and the dresser less likely to tip when the drawers are open. A cordless drill/screwdriver is handy when putting this together. Sometimes you need to use a low-torque setting to avoid over-screwing--you don't want to chew-up the engineered wood. This was easy to put together, even with a kid "helping."
customer_reviews.author: MO_TAG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. I had been looking for a modestly priced dresser to put in my Girl’s Room Closet, to accommodate our new born baby’s clothing, this is our third daughter. We have a 16 month old and a ten year old, and now a newborn. This dresser fit in the closet space perfectly, and was very easy to assemble. I am also impressed with the quality. It’s very sturdy, and the bottom cuby area is fantastic! My toddler immediately went to her toys and started playing with them. I love this dresser, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne R Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts
customer_reviews.text: When I got the product, a part of the top drawer was broken. I had to re-order the part again and got it quick. The company is pretty good at it, no complain. While trying to assemble it, it was broken again and ordered the same part the second time. I got this product just a month ago but now the top drawer is completely broken and the other drawer is not closing properly. Also not easy assemble. All parts are so cheap so you can brake them easily.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great for a nursery or kid's room
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price. I bought this, along with the matching night stand, for my daughter's room. I didn't want to invest a lot of money into furniture (mostly because I suspect it will end up covered in crayon art and dirty hand prints), so I turned to Amazon.com for affordable furniture with fast shipping. I wasn't disappointed. Assembly was fairly straight forward with pictures for reference. The reason for 4/5 stars- the drawers tend to "fall" into place causing a displeasing noise. Mamas, hold onto the handle until it's completely closed if you don't want to wake baby!
customer_reviews.author: SlowWhite09

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I searched for an affordable, attractive, and durable dresser for our young son. We finally decided to just buy Sauder because we have had good luck with their products in the past. We were not disappointed. We bought this in conjunction with the Bookcase/Footboard. Easy to put together and very good looking. Our son really liked the open bottoms. We recognize that this is not "real" furniture and will likely not hold up for decades but for our purposes it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Greegor

customer_reviews.title: This dresser was pretty simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: This dresser was pretty simple to put together, but expect to take some time on it. It took me about 4 continuous hours. I'm giving this 3 stars because although it was simple to build, the top drawer was impossible for me to get it on track right. So now I have to wait for my brother to come help me. One other thing is one of the knobs broke in half while tightening it onto the dresser, no biggie, but wish these issues didn't come up :)
customer_reviews.author: haylee stewart

customer_reviews.title: Dog toy chest
customer_reviews.text: It took about 3 hours to put together by myself. Some of the parts aren't labeled, which made it a little bit difficult, but not awful. I need to adjust the top drawer as it scrapes the top when closing. I think if I move the rails down a little, it will be okay. There were a few imperfections in the outside white paint. That doesn't bother me as its for my dogs room. The toy chest is perfectly sized, my dog can stick his head in and get his toys out. The drawers are big enough to fit all of his other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. My husband usually assembles our furniture so it took me a little bit longer (maybe 1.5-2 hours) but it was easy enough to follow the instructions. Once assembled this is heavy and sturdy. Perfect for a child’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Monica O

customer_reviews.title: Solid dresser, good value
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is well built and assembles fairly easily. I will caution you to avoid over-tightening the knobs, I cracked one when I went just a bit too tight. Other than that no concerns, it comes with a small bracket that you can use to attach it to the wall and we plan on doing that once we decide where it will stay. My daughter is also a bit too short to really use the top drawer, so we're having to get her a stepping stool, just something to think about if you're considering this for younger children.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Warren

customer_reviews.title: Damaged both times during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid dresser, however, it was damaged during shipping so i returned it, only to have the replacement also damaged. Apparently Sauder knows about this problem necause they will send out replacement parts, no questions asked, without even having proof that you bought the item. Once put together it does look really nice and it has metal drawer slides which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dresser. I bought it for my daughter. I added some beautiful crystal knobs and removed the ones that came with it. Unfortunately, after 2 months, the bottom drawer keeps coming off track. I will try to get it adjusted because I absolutely love this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile, might need a drill, but it's a good piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: This Drawer Chest was a beautiful match to my daughter's bedroom set. The directions made putting it together easy to understand however, if you want to get this done in a timely manner, I'd suggest two people. It took me almost 5 hours to get all of the pieces together... and I actually like putting items together but this timeframe was a little excessive. Also, the top drawer did not have holes for the last two knobs. That was pretty disappointing, given that I had invested my late afternoon and early evening putting this together. Overall, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: justinsider

customer_reviews.title: Everything was fine until it was time to put in the drawers
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine until it was time to put in the drawers. It was crazy difficult to do that, and then I keep having to rub a wax bar on the tracks - like once a month. Then my daughter pulled a drawer out too far and it went off the tracks - now I can't get it back in! What the heck? I never have a problem - it's like it was cheaply made.... Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Simrplyain

customer_reviews.title: lovely item, watch out for FedEx miss-handling it or dropping it off short due to the weight.
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, great quality. Bit smaller than expected but this is probably good as it is going in our 4 year olds room. If the seller is reading this, the packaging arrived in the worst state I have ever seen and my heart sank. It was also left at the bottom of the stairs that lead to our apartment pretty much on the street (in full view of passersby and extremely easy for someone to have taken). I was sure there would be damage but respect to the packaging, all seems in order.
customer_reviews.author: William Lord

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great dresser for my baby. I got it for under It Originally was $160 and then went to $100 which was an awsome price and so worth it. Took me some time to put together its big and heavy. I definitely recommend getting this if need something simple and affordable Its not high end but also not crap either. I would give it 4.5 stars if i could, didnt give 5 because the instructions we're not easy to understand and Im good at assembling things.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Find, well worth more then the price.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the quality of this dresser especially considered the price I paid. I purchased this for my daughter. For this piece not being sold wood, it is so durable and sturdy. I just love it. The storage section is a definite plus! having a 6 year old daughter I could use all the storage I can get! Her room is not very spacious so the fact that the dresser has more height than width was perfect for her bedroom. The drawers are spacious and fit a great amount of clothing and they are nice and wide was well. Would highly recommend this piece!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Costa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This chest surpassed by expectations. Sturdy/heavy weight/built without a drill. It was fairly easy to follow the instruction and build. Very satisfied. Looks like it’s worth more then purchase price! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Amir Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great drawer chest for my girls' room. I bought the matching bookcase and they look good side by side though I had hoped the depth would match up (it didn't but I still like how it looks). The storage at the bottom actually holds a lot more than I thought it would. The drawers are good quality and slide very easily, though I wish it had that feature that many kid's dressers have where it's slightly locks if you pull lightly. Still love it and it was a good purchase. It tool my husband about an hour to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: One came pretty much dent free
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these at the time time. One came pretty much dent free. The other came with many dents, chips and scrapes. Two of the knobs cracked right in half. The stickers to label the parts are places on the outside instead of hidden on the inside of the dresser. The drawers are a little uneven. The wood is particleboard. I didn't expect much for the price it's great I just wish it didn't arrive with dings. One of them is on the top piece and very visible. I'm not sure I will but the matching bookshelf I was thinking about now after seeing the quality of these dressers
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I could have probably won the 10,000 home video show if I would have taped my son in law trying to assemble this thing. Lol. He did get frustrated but it went together well. Very sturdy. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and tall.
customer_reviews.text: So it's only been up for a day but I love this dresser. The bottom cubby space is great! My boyfriend put it together in about 2 hours. He said the instructions were very clear, & all the pieces were there. It was a knick or two on the dresser. But they were all on the unfinished side that didn't show. So far so good. Very sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nita P.

customer_reviews.title: very cute & good quality dresser!
customer_reviews.text: We got this dresser for our baby's nursery. We absolutely love it. It is a great quality & the toy chest at the bottom is great for holding random blankets & items you don't have a spot for yet. The dresser came completely un-assembled in a million pieces so it took a while to put together but overall was a pretty easy assembly once you got into it.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Martin

customer_reviews.title: The Shoe Bin is the Real Star Here
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's new room. It matches her bed and book case. It's perfectly sized to fit tops, bottoms and a miscellaneous drawer. What really caught my eye though was the bin on the bottom. We use it for shoes. No more fighting over putting shoes away, just throw them in the bin and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mishele J.

customer_reviews.title: Not difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brand's bedroom. She loves it and had made the bottom storage a bed for her cat! It looks great and she uses a stool for the top drawer. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: jjba

customer_reviews.title: I love this dresser, but it came with some marks..
customer_reviews.text: The side and top had a small scratch and a bubble that broke up the paint on the top...But I love this dresser a lot. Assembly was not easy at all, but I'm a sucker for the finished product. We swapped out the white knobs for these jute knobs and I love it. I adore the blanket storage in the bottom for my little one!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Cumbie

customer_reviews.title: Solid, nice-looking dresser
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a guest room and it’s very nice - solid, attractive, and the drawers move easily. I hired to someone to assemble it so can’t speak to ease of assembly, but I thought it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Very cute dresser but...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute dresser but the top two drawers do not sit right. Trying to get in touch with customer support was impossible,especially when you work and you have to be at the dresser to work on it.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the book shelf/toy staorage of this product a year and a half ago, and it has held up extremely well. I was looking for something inexpensive but would still last a few years for my four year old. The drawers have the perfect amount of space, and the bottom held much more stuffed animals than I thought it could. Assembly took my husband and I a few hours, but was overall pretty easy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The predrilled holes are crooked. The top and bottom drawer are not straight. The bottom closes but you can clearly see how crooked it is and the top drawer won't close all the way because of the same thing. Not happy with this item especially for the money spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Schwalbauch

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for kids room
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think it is a pretty nice piece of furniture for my child's room. I was a little disappointed to see a handful of imperfections on the individual pieces while unboxing. We followed the directions and somehow had like 4 extra pieces of hardware. Drawers to need extra attention at the end in order for everything to look and fit properly
customer_reviews.author: Ashley19

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Line!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my 2 years olds first set of "big girl" furniture. It went together super easy and looks adorable! Her room is very small so I needed furniture that combined her clothing storage and toy storage. The quality is good for the price but I had realistic expectations. It met our budget and will get is by until she wants to upgrade her room in her preteen years but definitely isn't and heirloom piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The components of the chest were not proportionately designed. The drawers don't fit the chest at all. I have to do lots of extra carpenter work to adjust it. Also, the top part has a couple of dents. I don't want to bother to return it only because I understand that it's just a cheap stuff, I shouldn't expect too much of it.
customer_reviews.author: Fang W.

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a matching night stand, construction was so crappy I returned this before I opened the box. I'm handy, but I'm not able to fix the poor design! Even with clamps and wood glue!
customer_reviews.author: PcItalian

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chest for my 2 year old sons new room as I thought it was perfect that it had a toy box storage area in the bottom. We love it. The white matches his bedroom set perfect and the storage area underneath has become the perfect place for stuffed animals and trucks lol. I highly recommend the quality and function of this item. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: SAMI

customer_reviews.title: As pictured but box was damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The box I received was damaged and in turn some of the wood was. Luckily it the pieces damaged are on the interior of the dresser or it would have been returned. Drawers open very smoothly however, one of my knobs did split while putting it together so we had to purchase new knobs. I would suggest getting it through another buyer like Walmart if you are considering it so chances of it being damaged are less.
customer_reviews.author: jshell

customer_reviews.title: but this company is great about replacing damaged pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd piece of furniture I have bought from this company. Two of the 3 came with damaged pieces, but this company is great about replacing damaged pieces! No questions asked. Easy to put together instructions are clear and have cute sayings in it like “Don’t worry. It isn’t Rome. This can be built in a day.” There are also tips and such like righty right lefty loosey. Any way overall good quality and company to purchase from
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gorsuch

customer_reviews.title: The drawers are not as sturdy as I thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: There were two distinct chips with the dresser. The drawers are not as sturdy as I thought they would be. The dresser also came with no bolts and screws to bolt to the wall (in case the dresser falls forward). Paint is cheap and I can see the fake wood behind it. We are a disappointed. We have a toy bookshelf and we love it. But after this, we are not sure if we want to purchase from this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made dressers
customer_reviews.text: These dressers are very well made and went together well. I bought one for each of my children. I am putting special knobs on that go with each of their room decor. It is nice as I can get rid of the toy box in their rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy kids furniture
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks nice. Granddaughters love them and the open bin makes it easy for them to put their toys away.
customer_reviews.author: Goos

customer_reviews.title: Strong Dresser’s
customer_reviews.text: Love this dressers!!! Nice and strong my daughter’s love them and I’m happy they like them. Definitely need to be anchor since they are very heavy. I wish drawers could be a bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: Arwendina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters love this dresser. It is sturdy and nicely made. Solid drawers and fairly easy to assemble. Very pleased with this product. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: valerie k

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but really cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and cute but the particle board its made from is so cheap. We are affraid to move it because it splits easily. It already did the first time we moved it. The top split from the bottom when we lifted it to move it. Material is really cheap. And it comes in a million pieces. Took forever to assemble. The instructions were not hard but super time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I'm not good assembling furniture but my husband is the best
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I'm not good assembling furniture but my husband is the best. We loved this 3-drawer chest not even Ikea has a piece of furniture that beautiful. It had 2-3 dents/tiny damages(the good thing is that there not visible thanks to the drawers.... We were lucky!) Packages was pretty bad we thought maybe the inside could be worse but no.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly }i{

customer_reviews.title: Don't be surprised if it arrives damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging arrived damaged, so I didn't have high hopes that the dresser would be intact. Unfortunately, I was right. The good thing is that this dresser is just a temporary piece of furniture for our family until we are no longer moving around with the military. I am also surprised by how top heavy it is on carpet. Maybe it would be more stable on different flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks in my baby’s nursery. I gave it 4 stars because of how difficult it is to assemble and that is gets easily scratched, but I like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but that's good bc it makes you mindful of the drawers you ...
customer_reviews.text: looks as pictured if you take you time to make it. you have to close the upper drawer to open on beneath it, but that's good bc it makes you mindful of the drawers you may leave out. Im not a kid lol, so I use the bottom portion for canned/dry food storage in my room ( I have roommates). the packaging came a little beat up, but didn't affect the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Building two of these dominated my day today, but I'd allowed for that so it's not a problem. Time will tell how well they holds up since the majority of it is held together by pegs. For now though, we've taken control of the kids' room so they've done their job.
customer_reviews.author: Davidius

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Seems very sturdy. Good product for the price. Be aware the box it comes in is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughters room. It’s large and heavy. Hoping it will last for her sister.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser!!
customer_reviews.text: Its not lightweight, its actually super heavy but got little pegs bottom so can drag. Pretty easy to build, one knob broke when screwing but company sent another. No complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon opening
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and the a chunk out of the wood is missing. Feel it should have been unacceptable to put a defective product in a box. Was the first thing I noticed when opening the box- so it's not like production wouldn't have noticed it as well. Dissapointed. Haven't put product together yet. I have a photo, however the amazon app will not let me upload it for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gallas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! Its sturdy, beautiful, and saves space in my daughter's room. I would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Collins

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Functional. Took forever to put together. Directions suck. Made out of press board. Overall, I'm happy with it. Did NOT come with a proper wall safety mount. The one it comes with, you have to screw it into the top of the dresser. Super lame to have to ruin the top of the dresser. We used different knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Layman

customer_reviews.title: American jobs, I think we can all agree on that.
customer_reviews.text: Made in the good ol USA.. very high quality like you’d expect from U.S. made stuff excluding Chevy.. Thia thing really is great. Very high quality and sturdy..
customer_reviews.author: Jarred P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional, easy to assemble! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time purchasing this! We got the first one for our first child and it's durable, functional and easy to assemble. We didn't hesitate to buy the same one for the second child. The draws are a nice range of sizes and open and close with ease. The storage bin below holds TONS of toys!! We'll be purchasing the coordinating night-stand next.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts don’t line up right and it looks sideways upon being completed
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ulsky

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than expected. We really like it and it fit perfect in our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: AMabes

customer_reviews.title: It really is a very beautiful chest. Took me 2 hours to put together
customer_reviews.text: We weren’t looking to spend a lot for our 1 year olds room so we were skeptical what kind of quality we’d be getting. I’m pleasantly surprised. It really is a very beautiful chest. Took me 2 hours to put together. Directions were great. I love the cubby for miscellaneous items. It’s sturdy. Drawers are in well. Deep drawers just right for our toddlers clothes. Happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Bleigh

customer_reviews.title: It is nice!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use Power Drills! It took me about an hour to assemble. Near the end I got lazy and started using a drill, as I was drilling in one of the drawer knobs, It started to crack :(. Very nice quality, matching color, and my kid can throw all her crap that is on the floor conveniently into the bottom storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but awful materials
customer_reviews.text: The practicality of this piece is 5 stars but it’s very cheap quality. Some of the knobs were already split when we unwrapped everything and the bottom of one drawer arrived damaged. Not worth the time or effort to send it back. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Press board would not even hold the screws. Private contractor stated the drawer fronts couldn't be made to stay on. Left particles all over the floor. drawer bottoms are flimsy, and contractor advised it would not stay together. Don't waste your money, it really belongs on a burn pile.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Stone-Healy

customer_reviews.title: ... weight had to reinforce with nails but they work great now. It did take a long time to ...
customer_reviews.text: The draws don't hold a lot of weight had to reinforce with nails but they work great now. It did take a long time to put together by myself so I would recommend at least two people put together and was extremely heavy. Still standing and holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It is what you can expect for the price. Pretty easy to assemble, but the book could have had more detailed instructions. I also didn't like all the screws, nuts and other bits just being in a bag instead of separated. Also shorted me one of those cam nut things, but I had extras from another project. The back is a bit wonky with two seperate boards not actually attaching to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Couch Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Dresser and Toy Box combo
customer_reviews.text: I have always been very happy with the Sauder brand and of course this dresser was no dissapointment. Easy to put together for packed furniture and very sturdy. Sauder has always been a heavier pack and ship product which is one of the reasons they are so durable. Space saving with the toy box like feature at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Toddler.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PIECE!!! It’s so sturdy & such a good size for my toddlers clothing. I love the extra storage on the bottom to stuff all her baby dolls and blankets. Has no assembly issues & arrived without damage. Great product for the price. I got this when the price dropped which was just an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful tightening drawer knobs
customer_reviews.text: The knobs are pretty week, we had a couple crack on while putting them on. Ended up changing out all the knobs with completely different one's. Also, there was a chip on the top left back corner of the side piece corner. Otherwise, we love the dresser, very cute for our toddler daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. This product is a disappointment. The wood is weak and breaks easily. Moving from one corner to the other requires extreme gentleness so it does not break a part. My daughter is extremely disappointed. Save your money for better and more expensive product!
customer_reviews.author: mommy

customer_reviews.title: that want even the worse part. They sent me a drawer that was ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to apologize to myself for even buying this dresser. Multiple cracks in dresser but, that want even the worse part. They sent me a drawer that was crafted the opposite way in which it actually should have been. My brother in law puts furniture together for a living he works for a company that puts beds dressers and anything else together and he is the one that lit my dresser together. Take a look at the pictures i added
customer_reviews.author: marquisha zant

customer_reviews.title: Its useless and heading to the curb
customer_reviews.text: This dresser started with such promise, but after a year and a half, the flimsy particle board drawer bottoms keep popping out. Its useless and heading to the curb.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Christenberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking  but some problems
customer_reviews.text: The dresser is nice looking, but we had a piece of hardware missing. There is a small chip in the top of the dresser. It was easy to assemble, except for the missing piece. We have reordered the missing hardware and a new top. They are supposed to ship in one to two days. It came packaged well and wrapped in plastic to protect the box. It looks very nice and the drawers slide smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Keller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The box this comes in is HEAVY. But it was easy to assemble and came out great! This dresser is pretty tall but there’s so much room in the toy box and the drawers are very big and deep. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Frenton

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very functional for our 1 year old twins, who really enjoy the toy box base. Sturdy, and the drawers work well. My only complaint is that the product had a strong off- gas for about a month. I would recommend assembly beforehand and letting the product air out before putting it in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Munn

customer_reviews.title: It does what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I think a rolltop for the bin would be a good thing, other than that, great chest of drawers
customer_reviews.author: waddgodd

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this is a great chest. Great value would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality dresser. It’s sturdy, and my daughter loves it. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B

customer_reviews.title: ... together myself 7 months pregnant and it wasn't too bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Put this together myself 7 months pregnant and it wasn't too bad at all. I have the toy chest/book shelf of this and that was actually a bit harder to put together. The only thing that 'kind of' was a pain in the butt was making sure the drawers looked even. Not a huge amount of space but will be perfect for my newborn!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Sturdy and easy to put together. Arrived Undamaged. Knobs are a bit fragile. One cracked while installing
customer_reviews.author: xoxo

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy but be prepared for a long assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! This dresser has plenty of storage and is durable enough to be maintained as my 22 month old daughter's primary dresser for years to come. My only qualm was with the time and effort that was dedicated to assembly. My husband assembled this dresser and it took him over 3.5 hours. The rails for the drawers were pretty as Saunder chose not to lable or sort any of the screws. It was a fishing game trying to determine which screw should be used at each stage of the assembly. Overall, this pain point with the assembly was not enough to deter my rating. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: A Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy assembly. Nice product. The knobs are plain white and don't tighten all the way, but I plan to replace with pretty pink ones anyway. I love the bin, great for toys. Constructed of "ok" material. Can't expect that you are getting a handcrafted family heirloom item at this price. Definitely what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much, it looks amazing in my daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our nursery!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Bought this for our daughters nursery. It didn’t take too long to put together and the instructions were easy enough for us.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong product. I was supposed to receive a soft white dresser and I got a coffee night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product and especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and especially for the money. It's not solid wood...particle board covered with white laminate. Assembly wasn't that challenging. Took me about 30-45 minutes. So you can go out an buy a $600+ piece of furniture or go with this and sacrifice a little bit of quality but still get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Surfman

customer_reviews.title: Considering the poor quality. One of the drawers doesn’t close the ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s expensive! Considering the poor quality. One of the drawers doesn’t close the way it supposed to. It has a bit of an opening.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Aguirre

product_meta.title: Sauder Pogo 3-Drawer Chest, Soft White finish
product_meta.description: Looking to create some much needed storage for your child's abundance of clothes and toys? Look no further! This 3-drawer chest from the Pogo collection is just what your child's bedroom needs. It features three spacious storage drawers that open and close on smooth metal runners, providing you with convenient space to stow away items like your child's collection of shirts, assortment of shoes, all their favorite jammies and much more! It also features a large storage bin for easy to reach storage of items like puzzles, board games and stuffed animals too! It includes an ID label tag for easy labeling and organization of your child's belongings. The top surface also provides you with room to store and display anything from books and toys to picture frames and home décor. It is detailed with whimsical curves and a solid wood knob to add an extra touch of fun to your child's room. Finished in Soft White, this cute dresser is the solution to all your storage woes.
feature_bullets: Safety tested for stability to help reduce tip-over accidents
Drawers with metal runners and safety stops feature patented T-lock assembly system
This chest has been thoroughly tested in an ISO 17025 accredited lab that is Underwriters Laboratories certified
This item is eligible for free replacement parts. Contact Amazon Customer Service for more information.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars452 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
